HEADING: Invite an Admin
MESSAGE_INVITE_DESCRIPTION: Inviting a user, who is currently a commenter, to be an administrator will elevate their account to admin status and add them to your tenant.
MESSAGE_CONFIRM_USERNAME: You will be adding the user with the username "<%= invitingUserName %>". Please be sure this is correct.
MESSAGE_PERMISSIONS: Which permissions would you want them to have upon accepting the invite?
